name: banditstudio
description: The result is excellent, top quality, and I would give it 6 out of 5, but only 5 out of 5 because at the last step of approving the sketch I said they needed the last iteration to get some details right. They said it would be done after colouring, but it was done wrong. They are redoing it, so +1 to the service, but they are making other mistakes and the fix was also low quality.

name: mindlesspursuit
description: This is my second order with them, and while communication stays high, I feel that the energy brought to the effort was greatly reduced. I don’t know if it was handed to a different artist to tackle or what but while the end result is technically proficient and I’ll use them again, I hope the energy of the first order reappears

name: thetedz0r
description: already worked with them together and i will do it again! really great artists and good communications can absolutely get what i want on paper and doesn't hastate if i had stuff to change such great guys def. recommend

name: topjimmy68
description: The Artmazigh team did a great job on my logo for my horror film production company. They communicated well and worked with me to bring my vision to life. I asked for revisions which they implemented and I am happy with the results. I highly recommend their services!

name: unspokengear
description: They did an amazing job step by step to help me create what I had envisioned. The communication back and for was effortless. It was a joy working with them.

name: moejoebro
description: ArtMazigh needs to be on the front page of Fiverr. He is the reason I’ve been spending money on Fiverr for 3 years

name: thesynthproject
description: What a great service here! Very responsive and easy to work with! Seller immediately understood what i was looking for and delivered an perfect endproduct plus they are very nice and helpful! Highly Recommended! Till next time and have a nice day!
